title.rendered: Meet and Greet Parking at Edinburgh

content.rendered:
If you are travelling from Edinburgh airport, we recommend you choose meet and greet parking to make life a little easier, and to avoid waiting for transfer buses and queues for parking spaces.  Meet and greet is fast, convenient and easy, especially if you are tight with time, have lots of bags, and or have family to take care of.

Your fully insured driver will meet you outside your departure terminal, conduct a quick check of your car, before making their way to the secure car park minutes away. This leaves you only yards to walk to the terminal building, and departure lounge.

Whilst your car is parked, you can rest assured that it is always safe and secure.  Your car will be driven by a uniformed, fully insured CRB checked driver and will be parked in a fully secure car park which will  have CCTV, flood lights and security fences around it. 

The safety of your car is paramount to Maple Parking Edinburgh, who have many precautions in place and work hard to ensure that your car is returned just as you left it.  Their drivers are always insured to drive your car between the airport and the car park and are specially trained to drive with care. You can read more about Car Safety here.

Meet and Greet Parking at Edinburgh Airport

  • Meet & Greet at Edinburgh 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year
  • 24/7 Security at all car parks
  • All Maple Parking Edinburgh staff are uniformed, fully insured and CRB checked.
  • Approved by Trading Standards, every approved operator is required to demonstrate that their parking facilities meet planning and security requirements

Customer Reviews

As well as safety, Meet & Greet Parking Edinburgh are passionate about giving you the best meet and greet experience with a smile, which is why they regularly ask their travellers to leave their feedback once they have travelled . This allows them to maintain a high level of service and highlights areas which can be improved. Don’t just take their word for it, take a look at what customers are saying, by reading the reviews.

 

** Please note that all Edinburgh Meet & Greet Packages are serviced by Maple Parking Edinburgh (a trading name of Maple Manor Parking UK Ltd).
